title: Did George Carlin Pen ‘The Paradox of Our Time’?
subtitle: A widely circulated essay has been attributed to Carlin, the Dalai Lama, an unnamed Columbine High School student, and Anonymous. So who wrote it?
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: A widely-circulated essay known as "The Paradox of Our Time" was penned by George Carlin.
